snippet: SIMON--Elaine. The Lotos Foundation remembers with fondness Elaine Simon, widow of Sidney Simon, a long-standing Member of the Lotos Club and generous benefactor of the Lotos Foundation. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SIMON--Elaine. The Lotos Foundation remembers with fondness Elaine Simon, widow of Sidney Simon, a long-standing Member of the Lotos Club and generous benefactor of the Lotos Foundation. 1/3
